testcase.name: Validating Study Submission without attaching a Related URL
testcase.system-out: Given a User has logged in to the NIH COVID-19 Biorepository Dashboard Application.passed When the User selects a Principal Investigator "Diego Juarez"...............passed And enters a unique IRB Protocol Number which can contain numbers and text such as "77YXB33".passed And enters a Study Title as "Automation Test"...............................passed And selects any Biospecimen Type "Other" and enters Other type as "Automation Test".passed And selects any Biospecimen Collection Frequency............................passed And verifies that "NCI Frederick" text is displayed in the Repository Location text box.passed And enters Study Specific Aims "Test Automation"............................passed And attaches an IRB Protocol Document.......................................passed And does not attach a Related URL...........................................passed Then the User is able to successfully submit the study "77YXB33"............passed

testcase.name: Validating Study Submission with attaching multiple Related URL's
testcase.system-out: Given a User has logged in to the NIH COVID-19 Biorepository Dashboard Application.passed When the User selects a Principal Investigator "Diego Juarez"...............passed And enters a unique IRB Protocol Number which can contain numbers and text such as "77DJ88".passed And enters a Study Title as "Automation Test"...............................passed And selects any Biospecimen Type "Other" and enters Other type as "Automation Test".passed And selects any Biospecimen Collection Frequency............................passed And verifies that "NCI Frederick" text is displayed in the Repository Location text box.passed And enters Study Specific Aims "Test Automation"............................passed And attaches an IRB Protocol Document.......................................passed And attaches multiple Related URLâ€™s.........................................passed Then the User is able to successfully submit the study "77DJ88".............passed

testcase.name: Verifying a user is not able to submit a study form when not attaching an IRB Protocol Document
testcase.system-out: Given a User has logged in to the NIH COVID-19 Biorepository Dashboard Application.passed When the User enters all required information...............................passed But does not attach an IRB Protocol Document................................passed And attempts to confirm and submit the study form...........................passed Then the user is not able to successfully submit the study form.............passed And sees a pop up with a message indicating study documentation is required before submitting.passed And when selecting "Go Back"................................................passed Then under Study Documentation the user sees the message " Study documentation is required. Please attach the appropriate file(s). ".passed And the user logs out.......................................................passed

testcase.name: Verifying Home Page verbiage
testcase.system-out: Given a User has logged in to the NIH COVID-19 Biorepository Dashboard Application.passed When the user is on the submissions home page...............................passed Then the user should see the home page below verbiage.......................passed

testcase.name: Verifying empty field messages
testcase.system-out: Given a User has logged in to the NIH COVID-19 Biorepository Dashboard Application.passed When the User enters any IRB Protocol Number and immediately deletes it.....passed And clicks on any other field on the page...................................passed Then an error message displays for IRB field with the message "Please enter an IRB protocol number".passed When the User enters any Study Title and immediately deletes it.............passed And clicks on any other field on the page...................................passed Then an error message displays for title with the message "Please enter a title for this study. This field is required.".passed When the User selects a Biospecimen Collection Frequency and then immediately selects no option.passed And clicks on any other field on the page...................................passed Then an error message displays for colection with the message "Please select the appropriate collection frequency. This field is required.".passed When the User enters any Study Specific Aim and immediately deletes it......passed And clicks on any other field on the page...................................passed Then an error message displays for aims with the message "Please enter the study specific aims. This field is required.".passed

testcase.name: Verifying Study Form Submission as a Reviewer
testcase.system-out: Given a User has logged in to the NIH COVID-19 Biorepository Dashboard Application.passed And successfully submits a Study Form.......................................passed When impersonating a reviewer...............................................passed Then the submitted study is displayed and options to Approve or Reject are available.passed

testcase.name: Reviewer Login
testcase.system-out: Given a Reviewer navigates to the COVID-19 Biorepository login page.........passed When the Reviewer selects Login to access button............................passed And logs in by entering iTrust credentials..................................passed Then the Reviewer is directed to the Submissions page.......................passed And is able to see two tables names "Studies Pending Approval" and "Approved / Rejected Studies".passed
